description: Labor displacement is a major concern about AI that the world needs to talk seriously about.
title: Jon Stewart Is Right About the Dangers of AI

description: This year, TIME launched its inaugural list of the World’s Top EdTech Companies of 2024, in partnership with Statista, a leading international provider of market and consumer data and rankings. The result of this quantitative study: 250 companies changing the field of educational technology. Here’s how the winners were selected. Methodology The research project “World’s…
title: How TIME and Statista Determined the World’s Top EdTech Companies of 2024

description: Australia’s Prime Minister called Elon Musk, owner of X and self-styled free-speech champion, an “arrogant billionaire.”
title: ‘Arrogant Billionaire’: Elon Musk Feuds With Australian PM Over Content Takedown Orders
